question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements about Sir Pherozshah Mehta?
  1. He was one of the founders of Indian National Congress
  2. He served as President of Indian National Congress thrice
  3. He launched Bombay Chronicle
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Sir Pherozshah Mehta is known as Lion of Mumbai, this Parsi businessman became the Municipal commissioners of Bombay Municipality in 1873 and remained its president for 4 times. He was one of the founders of INC and in 1890, he became president of Indian National Congress. He started Bombay Chronicle, an English-language weekly newspaper.
